title: Frantic
description: In this Dateline classic, Christina Morris vanishes while at a high-end shopping mall. Her family members search for her, while police try to find out who might have been responsible for her disappearance. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 24, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
